description: This dataset contains demographic and educational factors related to student performance in math, reading, and writing exams. It includes 1,000 students, capturing their gender, race/ethnicity, parental education level, lunch type, and test preparation course participation, alongside their exam scores. The goal is to uncover how background and preparation influence academic achievement.

notes.source: Public educational dataset, commonly known as 'StudentsPerformance.csv' on Kaggle.
notes.usage: Useful for analyzing educational inequality, studying performance gaps, and building regression or classification models to predict exam outcomes.
